snippet.title: The Silver Key - The Game
snippet.description: Your spells have succeeded and you´ve just got through the first door to an unknown dimension, very different from the one you are used to. Your eyes have never met scenarios such as the ones you are going to discover, your mind will have to be adaptive to go forward into a side-scroller game with cold colours and shadows in a Tim Burton's style. As time goes by, you will see fragments of the story co-written by Lovecraft and Hoffmann "Through the gates of the silver key" * blended with a variety puzzles, enemies and traps.
